name: Vapor Guy
description:
Vapor Guy is a platformer that takes you back to the 80s. Bruce, a young boy is locked in an arcade terminal, how he got there, we don't know, but your goal for sure is to help him get out of here by reaching the end of the level. Get to the end of the world, explore it, but get out alive.  

FEATURES 
  • A  cool guy full of colors 
  • An immersive world with a stylish art direction 
  • Challenges, secret paths, and other cool stuff ! 

This game was made in one week during a workshop for our school. There are things to polish and fix but we still worked hard on this and I hope we'll get some review on it. If you just have a fade when you start the game and you can't play, just redownload it.  ( After 2 or 3 launch , it may happen also ). 

MADE BY 
  • Samuel COTIN: Programer 
  • Sylvain D'Halluin :  2D Animator / 2D Artist 
  • Sofiane TERON : Game designer / Producer
